Instructions.Instruction: Click the 'Submit Test' button given in the bottom of this page to Submit your answers.
Test will not submitted automatically if the time expired.
Submit your Answers by clicking on "Submit Test" Button within time.
IF you not submit your Answers within Exam period, your Answers are not Considared/Submit automatically.
Do not click on Navigation buttons of browser window.
If you click on Navigation buttons of Browser, it may chance to exit or terminate the exam session.
